showScoreExcerpt:
"The unwieldy narrative, archetypal characters, and charming but mostly forgettable and derivative music cloud the view of this 'Bright Star.' Still, thereâ€™s freshness and appeal in the storytelling, and the director is at the top of his game...Once the fractured narrative becomes easier to follow in the second act, musical comedy heaven is upon us, and the tidy ending will leave you teary-eyed with a spring in your heart. For first-time musical writers, this is nothing short of a miracle."
